value.original: Cash VAT is a regime organizations may subscribe to, which is already available in some countries, like for example Spain or Germany.

row.value: Cash VAT is a regime organizations may subscribe to, which is already available in some countries, like for example Spain or Germany.

value.original: Organizations subscribed to Cash VAT regime can settle the VAT amounts to the Tax Authorities when collecting/paying the invoices, instead of at invoice creation. This regime may be a good option from a financial point of view, but on the other hand it may imply more effort when submitting the official tax reports. The Cash VAT Management for Openbravo tries to reduce this complexity.

row.value: Organizations subscribed to Cash VAT regime can settle the VAT amounts to the Tax Authorities when collecting/paying the invoices, instead of at invoice creation. The Cash VAT Management for Openbravo tries to reduce this complexity.

value.original: Implemented module script to fix invoice cash vat lines without fin_payment_detail_id. This is a consequence of external modules (like for example Remittance Infrastructure) that don't support yet the Cash VAT flow.
